SegmentPy
=====================================

LEFT NAV
---------
Installation
    Linux
    MacOS
    Windows (in test)

Quick Tutorial
    Train neural network models
    Rapid prediction with MPI
    Track activations of each layer
    Get(Live)/save/compare learning curves in Dashboard

Plug-ins:
    Compare raw tomograms and segmentation in VolViewer
    Retrieve IoU/accuracy/aolume aractions... in MetricViewer
    Visualize local minimum with Loss-Landscape extractor (upcoming)

For Developpers
    Organigram
    Where to put your customized model
    Where to put your customized augmentation

Credits & Contributors
    License
    References
    Github
